name: editor - tabulator sign
description:
adds a tabulator sign to the editor.

may work also for stylish in chrome and opera.
additional_info:
change log 2018-03-28 - added new firefox exension id to the style (moz-extension://10edaf7e-5e7e-42ed-b6ff-f161c34b40a3) 2018-01-09 - just updated the licence to "no redistribution" 2017-12-05
  • added stylus links for opera and firefox
  • removed of global definition
2017-03-23
  • global defintion - to access the style from mostly everywhere - due to updates I changed the simple /* i really want this to be global */ to a reg-exp method.
2017-02-11
  • added seperate section to make the style accessable from all extention tabs
  • checked in chrome (stylish, stylus), opera (stylish)
  • screenshot added
  • added some related styles
2017-02-10
  • style seperated from STYL|US|ISH - black bg - chrome and opera
  • tabulator sign edited - it will work in black and white background.
